languages.text: Династии фон Валанциус была дарована привилегия стать наместниками Простора. Вольный Торговец вел{mf||а} завоевательные походы против анклавов ксеносов и еретических логовищ. В оскверненных системах знаменитый почитатель Губительных сил Каррад Валл собирал рати, чтобы бросить вызов Защитни{mf|ку|це} Кредо. Предстояло великое сражение.

The von Valancius dynasty was given the privilege of becoming the stewards of the Expanse. The Rogue Trader led many campaigns of conquest against xenos enclaves and heretic nests. Karrad Vall, an infamous disciple of the Ruinous Powers, gathered forces in corrupted systems to challenge the Defender of the Creed. A great confrontation was unavoidable.
languages.original_text: Династии фон Валанциус была дарована привилегия стать наместниками Простора. Вольный Торговец вел{mf||а} завоевательные походы против анклавов ксеносов и еретических логовищ. В оскверненных системах знаменитый почитатель Губительных сил Каррад Валл собирал рати, чтобы бросить вызов Защитни{mf|ку|це} Кредо. Предстояло великое сражение.

traits.locale_text: Von Valancius dynasty was given the privilege to become Lieges of Expanse. Rogue Trader led many conquest campaigns against xenos enclaves and heretic nests. A well-known Ruinous Powers worshipper Karrad Vall gathered forces in corrupted systems to challenge the Defender of the Creed. A great battle was soon to be had.

Von Valancius dynasty was given the privilege to become Lieges of Expanse. Rogue Trader led many conquest campaigns against xenos enclaves and heretic nests. A well-known Ruinous Powers worshipper Karrad Vall gathered forces in corrupted systems to challenge the Defender of the Creed. A great battle was soon to be had.

Karrad Vall, an infamous disciple of the Ruinous Powers, gathered forces in corrupted systems to challenge the Defender of the Creed. A great battle was coming.

Karrad Vall, an infamous disciple of the Ruinous Powers, gathered forces in corrupted systems to challenge the Defender of the Creed. A great battle was coming.

The von Valancius dynasty was given the privilege of becoming the stewards of the Expanse. The Rogue Trader led many campaigns of conquest against xenos enclaves and heretic nests. Karrad Vall, an infamous disciple of the Ruinous Powers, gathered forces in corrupted systems to challenge the Defender of the Creed. A great confrontation was unavoidable.

The von Valancius dynasty was given the privilege of becoming the stewards of the Expanse. The Rogue Trader led many campaigns of conquest against xenos enclaves and heretic nests. Karrad Vall, an infamous disciple of the Ruinous Powers, gathered forces in corrupted systems to challenge the Defender of the Creed. A great confrontation was unavoidable.

languages.text: 冯·瓦兰修斯王朝被授予了作为扩区守护者的特权。行商浪人领导了许多场重大战役，消灭了异形的窝点与异端分子的巢穴。某个叫做卡尔德·瓦尔的恶人准备挑战信条的捍卫者。这位恶名昭著的混沌信徒在腐化的星系中聚集力量，一场大战无可避免。
languages.original_text: The von Valancius dynasty was given the privilege of becoming the stewards of the Expanse. The Rogue Trader led many campaigns of conquest against xenos enclaves and heretic nests. Karrad Vall, an infamous disciple of the Ruinous Powers, gathered forces in corrupted systems to challenge the Defender of the Creed. A great confrontation was unavoidable.

traits.locale_text: 冯·瓦兰修斯王朝被授予了作为扩区总督的特权。行商浪人领导了许多场重大战役，消灭了异形的窝点与异端分子的巢穴。某个叫做卡尔德·瓦尔的恶人准备挑战信条的捍卫者。这位恶名昭著的混沌信徒在腐化的星系中聚集力量，一场大战即将爆发。

languages.text: Die Dynastie Valancius erhielt das Privileg, zu Lehnsherren der Ausdehnung zu werden. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} führte viele Eroberungsfeldzüge gegen Xenos-Enklaven und Nester von Ketzern an. Karrad Vall, ein berüchtigter Jünger der Mächte der Zerstörung, versammelte in verderbten Systemen Truppen, um den Verteidiger des Glaubens herauszufordern. Eine große Konfrontation war unvermeidlich.
languages.original_text: The von Valancius dynasty was given the privilege of becoming the stewards of the Expanse. The Rogue Trader led many campaigns of conquest against xenos enclaves and heretic nests. Karrad Vall, an infamous disciple of the Ruinous Powers, gathered forces in corrupted systems to challenge the Defender of the Creed. A great confrontation was unavoidable.

traits.locale_text: Die Dynastie Valancius erhielt das Privileg, zu Lehnsherren der Ausdehnung zu werden. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} führte viele Eroberungsfeldzüge gegen Xenos-Enklaven und Nester von Ketzern an. Karrad Vall, ein berüchtigter Jünger der Mächte der Zerstörung, versammelte in verderbten Systemen Truppen, um den Verteidiger des Glaubens herauszufordern. Eine große Schlacht nahte.

languages.text: Les membres de la dynastie von Valancius se virent offrir le rôle privilégié d'intendants des Étendues. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} mena de nombreuses campagnes de conquête contre les enclaves xénos et les repaires d'hérétiques. Karrad Vall, un disciple notoire des Puissances de la Ruine, réunit des troupes dans les systèmes corrompus pour défier {mf|le champion|la championne} du Crédo. Une grande confrontation s'annonçait.
languages.original_text: The von Valancius dynasty was given the privilege of becoming the stewards of the Expanse. The Rogue Trader led many campaigns of conquest against xenos enclaves and heretic nests. Karrad Vall, an infamous disciple of the Ruinous Powers, gathered forces in corrupted systems to challenge the Defender of the Creed. A great confrontation was unavoidable.

traits.locale_text: Les membres de la dynastie von Valancius se virent offrir le rôle privilégié de suzerains des Étendues. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} mena de nombreuses campagnes de conquête contre les enclaves xénos et les repaires d'hérétiques. Karrad Vall, un disciple notoire des Puissances de la Ruine, réunit des troupes dans les systèmes corrompus pour défier {mf|le champion|la championne} du Crédo. Une grande bataille s'annonçait.

languages.text: La dinastía von Valancius obtuvo el privilegio de convertirse en guardiana de la Extensión. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente lideró numerosas campañas de conquista contra enclaves xenos y guaridas de herejes. Karrad Vall, un infame discípulo de los Poderes Ruinosos, reunió sus fuerzas en sistemas corruptos para desafiar a{mf|l| la} Defensor{mf||a} del Credo. La confrontación era inevitable.
languages.original_text: The von Valancius dynasty was given the privilege of becoming the stewards of the Expanse. The Rogue Trader led many campaigns of conquest against xenos enclaves and heretic nests. Karrad Vall, an infamous disciple of the Ruinous Powers, gathered forces in corrupted systems to challenge the Defender of the Creed. A great confrontation was unavoidable.

traits.locale_text: La dinastía von Valancius obtuvo el privilegio de convertirse en Señores de la Extensión. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente lideró numerosas campañas de conquista contra enclaves xenos y guaridas de herejes. Karrad Vall, un infame discípulo de los Poderes Ruinosos, reunió sus fuerzas en sistemas corruptos para desafiar a{mf|l| la} Defensor{mf||a} del Credo. Se avecinaba una gran batalla.

languages.text: フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝は、エクスパンスの執政となる特権を与えられた。自由開拓者は異種族の拠点や異端の巣窟に対する征服作戦を数多く指揮した。悪名高き禍つ神々の弟子カラド・ヴァルは、信条の擁護者に挑むべく、腐敗した星系に勢力を集めた。大激突を避けることはできなかった。
languages.original_text: The von Valancius dynasty was given the privilege of becoming the stewards of the Expanse. The Rogue Trader led many campaigns of conquest against xenos enclaves and heretic nests. Karrad Vall, an infamous disciple of the Ruinous Powers, gathered forces in corrupted systems to challenge the Defender of the Creed. A great confrontation was unavoidable.

traits.locale_text: フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝は、エクスパンスの執政となる特権を与えられた。自由開拓者は異種族の拠点や異端の巣窟に対する征服作戦を数多く指揮した。悪名高き禍つ神々の弟子カラド・ヴァルは、信条の擁護者に挑むべく、腐敗した星系に勢力を集めた。大激突を避けることはできなかった。

languages.text: Enginlik'in idarecileri olma imtiyazı, von Valancius hanedanlığına verildi. Hür Tacir, zeno diyarlarına ve kâfir yuvalarına fetih amaçlı sayısız sefer düzenledi. Yıkıcı Güçler'in tanınan müridi Karrad Vall, yozlaşmış sistemlerde kuvvetlerini bir araya getirip İtikat'ın Savunucusu'na meydan okudu. Büyük bir çatışma yaşanması kaçınılmazdı.
languages.original_text: The von Valancius dynasty was given the privilege of becoming the stewards of the Expanse. The Rogue Trader led many campaigns of conquest against xenos enclaves and heretic nests. Karrad Vall, an infamous disciple of the Ruinous Powers, gathered forces in corrupted systems to challenge the Defender of the Creed. A great confrontation was unavoidable.

traits.locale_text: Enginlik'in yöneticileri olma imtiyazı von Valancius hanedanlığına verildi. Hür Tacir, zeno diyarlarına ve kâfir yuvalarına fetih amaçlı sayısız sefer düzenledi. Yıkıcı Güçlerin tanınan müridi Karrad Vall, yozlaşmış sistemlerde kuvvetlerini bir araya getirdi ve İtikat'ın Savunucusu'na meydan okudu. Büyük bir çatışma kaçınılmazdı.
